website_summaries.verdict: An excellent filter that is capable of producing professional-level results.
pros: Features a durable build and powerful performance
You will get diamond-clear water with this pool filter

customer_reviews.title: Happier today
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good with water flow below 40gpm. I haven’t seen any damage with flow up to 50gpm but head pressure made the system extremely inefficient. I’m using the 24sqft with a variable speed .85hp Hayward pump with about 120 total length of 1.5” sch 40 pvc pipe. Removing and cleaning the grids are much easier than sand filter I used to have. I rented a torque wrench from autozone before I bought my own to torque the clamp nut.
customer_reviews.author: abgndpool2012

customer_reviews.title: Fully assembled and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that Amazon was not exactly my first thought for purchasing pool equipment. So when my 12 year old Hayward DE7220 started leaking, I was not sure where to start looking. I found a great deal on Amazon, and figured I would give it a shot. I got my new one delivered in no time, and install was a breeze. It came fully assembled, and fit perfectly. I can’t believe how easy was. Great product, Fast delivery, Easy install...Amazon hits another one out of the park.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement filter
customer_reviews.text: Replacing a filter this size is a major investment. This filter replaced a 10 year old Jandy filter with a cracked housing. I chose the Hayward filter because they have reputation for quality products.
customer_reviews.author: joseph Vilicich

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear water
customer_reviews.text: DE filtration for pools is the only way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Dale F Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pool Filter and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I should never have waited as long as I did to replace my old pool filter. This cleans my 34x16 pool 2.5 times per day. I love the DE and the backwash capability of this filter. Every six weeks I can clean it simply with the Hayward SP0715XR50 Pro Series Vari-Flo Control attachment and this product works great. I am pleased with this product and overall service from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement
customer_reviews.text: This was a direct replacement installed in minutes. I would do business with this vendor again
customer_reviews.author: Robert Timpone

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller pools.
customer_reviews.text: If this filter lasts as long as the last one, I'll see ya in 20 years. It was nice that this one had the same measurements as the last. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is Better
customer_reviews.text: Perfect example of bigger is better. Fewer back-washings. Less work.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: I don't review products because I don't like wasting time
customer_reviews.text: I don't review products because I don't like wasting time. I moved from a 27 Sq ft de Hayward to this model and I am very happy with it. It is a work and time saver. I have not had to even open it yet only backwash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective and make sure you inspect it before using it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this new and installed it, loaded the de into it and noticed it pored into the pool. Upon further inspection, there is a defect in which the filter bags on the grids inside rub on the housing at the top causing tears and holes in all the bags. this holes allow material and de to pass into the pool.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pool it is looking good. No more yellow water with the new filter!
customer_reviews.author: A.Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping helped me solve a pool emergency quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new filter and this one fit the bill perfectly. I saved around one hundred fifty dollars by purchasing this from Amazon, Fast shipping helped me solve a pool emergency quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: William Dietsch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unit was exactly as expected. Fit perfectly and keeps pool clean.
customer_reviews.author: DELtx

customer_reviews.title: Hayward DE7220 Pro-Grid
customer_reviews.text: this filter works great. It gives me more time between backwashs. The only problem I had was I tried using the alternet de material made from wood pulp and it would not back wash all of it out. Switched back to DE and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Martin

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST HAYWARD FILTER!!!
customer_reviews.text: DAMAGED IT TOOK 3 DELIVERIES TO FINALLY GET A GOOD ONE BUT ONE OF THE BEST FILTERS IN THE MARKET, GREAT FILTRATION SYSTEM AND GREAT PRICE, NOT TO HAPPY WITH THE PROBLEMS WITH THE DELIVERY BUT THE FILTER IS GREAT!!!! THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: ROBERTO VILLEGAS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit. Hooked up fairly quickly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit. Hooked up fairly quickly. Replaced by Titan American products unit which was over 25 years old. 36 Sq ft. with this 60 sq ft. Bought the multiport valve from hayward as well. Only question I have is whether the recommended lbs of DE is 7.5lbs. This is almost the same amount I had for my previous 36 sq ft. Titan, 7lbs. All new fittings. 3 slips to remove unit in winter. I do this every year to help protect filter and motor from elements. Used gorilla glue for all fittings. Solid connections. Very happy. I'll post any updates in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: great shipping, product was as described
customer_reviews.text: prefect, just what i needed.great shipping, product was as described.
customer_reviews.author: Brucea58

customer_reviews.title: ... a Hayward Filter with this filter and are completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a Hayward Filter with this filter and are completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Warner

customer_reviews.title: Filter great but does not come with valve
customer_reviews.text: The filter is excellent but the advertising is misleading. It appears that the valve comes with it but it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Joy O'malley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Filter arrived without the valve The photo displays the filter with the valve. The valve should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rossi

customer_reviews.title: I have replace it for the cv580 jandy I'm very happy is the best
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this trash when they get polem is so complicated you going to have to open every week twice a week and if you're not paying a professional to do it not even talking about the DE powder that is toxic and the risk of getting cancer this item is trash . I have replace it for the cv580 jandy I'm very happy is the best . thank you
customer_reviews.author: christian

product_meta.title: Hayward DE2420 ProGrid D.E. Pool Filter, 24 Square Foot, Vertical Grid
product_meta.description:
Size:24 Square-FootFROM THE MANUFACTURER
Hayward de2420 pro-grid vertical d.e. Filter, 24-square-Feet. Pro-grid vertical grid d.e. Filters provide superior water clarity, efficient flow and large cleaning capacity for pools and spas of all types and sizes. Pro-grid combines high-technology features and "service ease" design for an unparalleled filtration value for both new pool and aftermarket installations. Applications: in-ground pools, in-ground spas or in-ground pool/spa combinations for vertical grid d.e. Filter series;dex2420bt filter head (de2420).
feature_bullets: Filter tanks are made from the most durable materials to meet the demands of the toughest applications and environmental conditions
High capacity, rapid release manual air relief valve bleeds air with a quick quarter turn of the lever
Heavy-duty, tamper-proof, one piece flange clamp securely fastens tank top and bottom and allows quick access to all internal components

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
